abstract: Mississippi Republican Trent Kelly wins special-election runoff against Democrat Walter Zinn to capture House seat held by Republican Rep Alan Nunnelee, who died of brain cancer in February 2015.
lead_paragraph: Trent Kelly, a Republican, won a special-election runoff for a United States House seat on Tuesday, defeating Walter Zinn, a Democrat, in the First District.

headline.main: Mississippi: District Attorney Wins Special Election for Seat in Congress
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: District Attorney Wins Special Election for Seat in Congress

snippet: Trent Kelly, a Republican, won a special-election runoff for a United States House seat on Tuesday, defeating Walter Zinn, a Democrat, in the First District.
